title: Rust Borrow Checker Lifetime Elision
description: In this lab, we explore the concept of elision in Rust, where the borrow checker allows the omission of common lifetime patterns to improve readability and reduce typing.

i18n.title: Rust 借用检查器的生命周期省略规则
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们探讨Rust中的省略规则概念，即借用检查器允许省略常见的生命周期模式，以提高可读性并减少输入量。
